alert.note: Alert for Canadian; Kingfisher (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 10 at 5:52PM CDT until April 10 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM CDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL KINGFISHER AND NORTHEASTERN CANADIAN COUNTIES... At 552 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles northeast of Okarche, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Northwestern Oklahoma City, El Reno, Yukon, Piedmont, Okarche, Concho, and Richland. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
